metadata.title: General parameters for Consul agent configuration
metadata.description: Use agent configuration files to assign attributes to agents and configure multiple agents at once. Learn about agent configuration file parameters and formatting with this reference page and sample code.

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
